definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
fully armed/armed to the teeth/fig. fully equipped
Chinese People's Armed Police Force (PAP, aka CAPF)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Wu3 zhuang1 Jing3 cha2 Bu4 dui4
containing_words.word: 中國人民武裝警察部隊

pinyin: ji1 jin4 wu3 zhuang1 fen4 zi3

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿邊境活躍的唯一非停火武裝是南撣邦軍701部隊。

sentences.english: The unidentified armed group used guns to force the Chinese crew to increase speed sailing towards Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 不明武裝用槍逼着中國船員加足馬力向泰國駛去。

sentences.english: registration with the people's armed forces departments at the county level.
sentences.chinese: 縣人民武裝部辦理預備役軍官登記。

sentences.english: A group of armed guards have arrived and are waiting outside the gate.
sentences.chinese: 一隊武裝警衛抵達並守衛在牢房區大門處。

sentences.english: The study of Marxism-Leninism will arm the intellectuals ideologically.
sentences.chinese: 學習馬列主義將從思想上武裝知識分子。

sentences.english: They took the form of armed struggle.
sentences.chinese: 她們採取了武裝鬥爭的形式。

sentences.english: Occasional regional and local armed conflicts flare up, and economic competition is becoming ever more acute.
sentences.chinese: 局部地區的武裝衝突時有暴發，經濟競爭更爲加劇。

sentences.english: A occasional chance, He a guns second-hand resell to commons armed force army.
sentences.chinese: 一個偶然的機會，他把槍支轉手倒賣給民間武裝軍隊。

sentences.english: In High Profile, use your Armed button to unsheathe your sword.
sentences.chinese: 在高姿態時，用你的“武裝”按鍵即可拔出你的劍。

sentences.english: John turned up for the ten-mile walk equipped for something more like an assault on Everest.
sentences.chinese: 約翰轉而開始了十英里的行軍，全副武裝。

sentences.english: The armed forces are so under-financed that aircraft crashes have become a monthly occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 武裝部隊資金嚴重不足，墜機事件已經每月出現一起。

sentences.english: Is that why I appear to be in downtown Fallujah behind the wheel of an up-armored Humvee?
sentences.chinese: 所以我在費盧傑市區，跟在一輛全副武裝的悍馬後面？

sentences.english: The local farmers have armed themselves with rifles and pistols.
sentences.chinese: 當地農夫以來福槍及手槍來武裝自己。

sentences.english: The Bani walid Green resistance has killed hundreds of Rebels at Outskirt desert.
sentences.chinese: 綠色抵抗武裝在郊區的沙漠擊斃數百名反對派。

sentences.english: Thousands of militants traded in guns for stipends and training.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬的武裝分子開始接受培訓並領取安家費。

sentences.english: No one is able or willing to disarm it.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能夠或者願意解除它的武裝。
